DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate the effectiveness and safety of DS-5565, compared to placebo, in subjects with pain associated with diabetic peripheral neuropathy.
DOC.brief_title: Asian Phase 2 Study for Treatment of Pain Associated With Diabetic Peripheral Neuorpathy
DOC.criteria: Type 1 or Type 2 diabetes mellitus Painful distal symmetric polyneuropathy Average daily pain score is great than or equal to 4 HbA1c greater than 9.0
